name: Viiret
description: The Viiret is a large plant creature with formidable combat abilities, notable for its biting and vine attacks.
memorable: Its ability to swallow enemies, blinding and restraining them, combined with its disease-related powers makes it a unique foe.
goals: To incapacitate foes and spread disease while surviving in combat.
relations: May be found in conjunction with other plant creatures or environmental threats.
environment: Generally located in areas rich in flora, possibly near swamps or forests.
strengths: High hit points, multiple attack options, immunities to necrotic and poison damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, low Dexterity and Intelligence.
attacks: Multiattack includes a bite and a vine attack, with the bite causing potential swallowing.
most_powerful_ability: Disease Sense allows it to detect poisoned or diseased creatures within 60 feet, enhancing its strategy.
senses: Blindsight 30 feet allowing it to detect foes nearby despite being blind beyond that.
additional_information: Immunity to disease and advantage against poisoned targets.
Ability to deal acid damage or necrotic damage based on swallowed target's condition.
Can swallow Medium or smaller creatures if they fail a saving throw.
Can regurgitate swallowed creatures under certain conditions.
Resistance to being blinded and frightened due to condition immunities.
test_queries: large plant monster with disease abilities
creature that swallows enemies in combat
plant creature immune to necrotic damage
creature that attacks with vines and bites
formidable foe with high resilience and disease sense
